title: Microsoft, Facebook and 9 More Stocks That Could Be a Surprise This Earnings Season
text:
Microsoft, Facebook and 9 More Stocks That Could Be a Surprise This Earnings Season

Text size

Paypal is among the companies that Morgan Stanley analysts expect to perform better than investors are counting on. Photograph by David Paul Morris/Bloomberg

Third-quarter earnings season is here, and the headline outlook is gloomy. S&P 500 earnings are forecast to decline 4.3% from a year earlier, led by tumbling energy-company earnings. But winners can still be found.

In a report out Wednesday, a team of analysts at Morgan Stanley identified their 11 highest-conviction names going into this earnings season, with positive catalysts over the next two months that they predict will send shares higher.

“For each of these stocks, our analyst has a view that diverges from the Street’s, and expects a near-term event to drive the stock as the market’s view moves closer to ours,” reads the report.
description: Analysts at Morgan Stanley identified their 11 highest-conviction names going into this earnings season, with positive catalysts over the next two months that they predict will send shares higher.
